name: AccuRev
overview: AccuRev, Inc. operates as a software change and configuration management solutions vendor. The company offers AccuBridge, an application lifecycle management (ALM) suite of software development kit that provides out-of-the-box integrations with IDEs, issue tracking tools, security/provisioning, and other third party tools; and AccuWork, which integrates change management with AccuRev for geographically distributed, agile, and parallel software developments. It also provides AccuReplica, an enterprise scaling solution for development projects that provides an access model for end users working locally on a company LAN or remotely across the WAN; and AccuRev for ClearCase, which allows collaborative development between the groups using ClearCase and AccuRev through bi-directional synchronization. It also provides AgileCycle that is designed for software configuration management, as well as for tracking issues and defects; Rally Software, an agile project and lifecycle management tool; and Urbancode Anthill Pro, which is designed for build and release management. In addition, AccuRev, Inc. offers technical support and professional, process audits, deployment, ALM integration, training and maintenance, and consulting services. The company was founded in 1993 under the name EDE Development Enterprises and changed its name to AccuRev, Inc. in 2002. The company is headquartered in Lexington, Massachusetts.

funding_rounds.source_description: AccuRev Raises $2.1 Million in Series A Funding, Adds Board Members
